title: Where to watch Succession season 3 online now
author: alice-marshall
summary: It's a war between father and son
article: The Emmy award-winning series has made its return for its thrilling third season as we return to the Roy family and their acts of deceit and betrayal. Reacquaint yourselves with the family fued of media mogul, Logan Roy, and his children as we tell you where to watch Succession season 3 online now with a HBO subscription.

Centering around the family patriarch portrayed by Brian Cox, Succession follows Logan's ridiculously rich - and completely dysfunctional - family. Heading the global media company, Waystar RoyCo, the battle of who will succeed Logan's position continues as we delve into the third season of Succession.

Following a brutal season finale in which Kendall (Jeremy Strong) blind-sided his father with his bombshell press conference, the Roy family is left in complete disarray. With Shiv (Sarah Snook) unsure of where to place her loyalties, Roman (Kieran Culkin) and Connor (Alan Ruck) continue, too, to circulate the patriarch, heading for what is promised to be a brutal corporate battle turned family civil war.

While it's yet to be confirmed whether or not this will be the final season, if it is the question on everyone's mind will be: who will take control of Waystar RoyCo? Make sure you know exactly where to watch Succession season 3 online depending on where you are in the world to find out.
